Package org.opengis.cite.iso19136.recommendations

package org.opengis.cite.iso19136.recommendations

Includes tests covering recommended constraints that need not be satisfied by a fully conforming IUT. In terms of RFC 2119, the corresponding requirement levels are SHOULD or SHOULD NOT. However, a user community may require adherence to these recommendations.

All tests for lexical conventions are currently disabled. According to The Specification Model - A Standard for Modular specifications (OGC 08-103r3), recommendations are not subject to conformance testing.

All test methods defined in this package belong to the "recommendations" group.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.opengis.cite.iso19136
    This executable test suite (ETS) validates GML application schemas or data in accord with ISO 19136:2007.
    org.opengis.cite.iso19136.components
    Includes tests to verify schema components that define specific types of geographic objects as required in clause 21.2.1 of ISO 19136.
    org.opengis.cite.iso19136.data
    Includes tests that apply to GML documents.
    org.opengis.cite.iso19136.general
    Contains test classes that check general constraints applicable to all GML application schemas.
    org.opengis.cite.iso19136.util
    This package includes miscellaneous utility classes to support testing.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LexicalConventionTests
    Includes tests for compliance with various lexical conventions that are "strongly recommended" in the specification.
